channel.title: How to make a server public?
channel.description:
Alright, I have an IP (No-IP), a server source (Funscap3), and I'm finally editing it. How do I make it so other people may go onto my server? This is what my connection is like.
My laptop > Netlink WNR834B > Cox High Speed Modem > Wall
Can anyone please give me step-by-step instructions to make my server public? Also, what do the people that want to go on my server (besides typing in the Port # and IP Name) have to do to use it on Web client? Do I have to download anything to make my server be able to work on the Web client?
Help......... (I know there's a tut, but I don't get it that much...) :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused:

item.title: How to make a server public?
item.dc:creator: @The_General The General
item.description:
@The_General wrote:

I’m currently there, and awaiting instructions. :o

Read full topic
